mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.status AS "status", a.version AS "version", a.create_user AS "createUser", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.update_user AS "updateUser", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.app AS "app", a.module_name AS "moduleName", a.module_code AS "moduleCode", a.config_template AS "configTemplate", a.max_serial AS "maxSerial", a.reset_type AS "resetType", a.is_auto_increment AS "isAutoIncrement", a.pre_max_num AS "preMaxNum", a.remark AS "remark"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_sys_serial_number( id, status, version, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, app, module_name, module_code, config_template, max_serial, reset_type, is_auto_increment, pre_max_num, remark ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{status}, 0, #{createUser}, #{createTime}, #{updateUser}, #{updateTime}, #{app}, #{moduleName}, #{moduleCode}, #{configTemplate}, #{maxSerial}, #{resetType}, #{isAutoIncrement}, #{preMaxNum}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_sys_serial_number SET status = #{status}, version = version +1, update_user = #{updateUser}, update_time = #{updateTime}, app = #{app}, module_name = #{moduleName}, module_code = #{moduleCode}, config_template = #{configTemplate}, max_serial = #{maxSerial}, reset_type = #{resetType}, is_auto_increment = #{isAutoIncrement}, pre_max_num = #{preMaxNum}, remark = #{remark} WHERE id = #{id}
